text: The Mayor of the City of Moscow is head of the executive branch of the political system in Moscow, the Government of Moscow. The mayor's office is in charge of all city services, public property, police and fire protection, most public agencies, and enforces all city and state laws within Moscow. The budget overseen by the mayor's office is the largest municipal budget in the Russian Federation. ==List of mayors== Portrait Name Term of office Term of office Political party Portrait Name Took office Left office Political party 1 Gavriil Popov 12 June 1991 6 June 1992 Democratic Russia 2 Yury Luzhkov 6 June 1992 28 September 2010 Fatherland – All Russia (prior to 1 December 2001) ↓ United Russia (since 1 December 2001) — Vladimir Resin 28 September 2010 21 October 2010 United Russia Sergey Sobyanin 21 October 2010 Incumbent United Russia ==Other websites== *Official Website
title: Mayor of Moscow
